body: There is a chance of having a solid shield, with no stripes. @marcrowo was pointing out that sometimes he was observing generated stripes with the same colors as the background. When looking over the python version of the code, we found that the luminescence check was backwards. It wasn't rejecting similar colors, included identical colors. That caused same color background and stripes.
